TopicTitle: NASA releases space sounds libary, could be useful for Squad or mod makers?

Articles.Content:
https://soundcloud.com/nasa

I know some mods already make use of freely available sounds, so perhaps this could also be useful to someone.

It contains a lot of various ambient clips like engines and quindar tones, as well as mission-specific callouts an commentaries.

Maybe you might just enjoy listening to them. The Cassini Saturn Radio Emissions is particularly creepy.

Source article with links to more libraries: http://createdigitalmusic.com/2014/10/nasa-posts-huge-library-space-sounds-youre-free-use/
